name: PlayGround UnReal
description:
Benny is painfully shy and deals with bully problems. As a result of this, Benny has an incredibly active imagination. In fact his imagination had become so powerful he became able to escape the world of reality and enter the plane of his imagination instead. Your mission, is to help Benny cross the playground and all of its obstacles, and approach a teacher who wanted to speak with him.

-Press ASWD to move your character and SPACE to jump

-Press the "E" key to enter and exit your imagination realm (Little bug, you may need to press twice at the start)

-You can move faster and jump higher in the Imagination Zone

-To complete the game, walk close to the teacher in the end (Pink Doll)

You can get to places in the imagination realm that you can't in the real world and vice versa, you need to use both zones in order to make it to the end!
